Offering bespoke consulting and BPO solutions designed to transform, automate and boost efficiency within your business
Your Digital Transformation
Partner Is Here
VISION
Innovative & Efficient Process Management

Sphere Global Solutions transforms business operations with innovative, customized BPO services. Through deep understanding of client needs, we implement solutions that improve efficiency, reduce costs, and elevate customer experience. Our expert team ensures exceptional service and fosters growth for global businesses.

COMPANY
Transforming Business With Expert Consulting
100%

Client satisfaction rate in delivering tailored BPO and consulting solutions.

20+

Partnered with over 20 global brands to transform business processes.

Over 30+

Average operational efficiency gains of for clients through process automation.

5,00,000 +

Hours of delivered project management for complex, large-scale initiatives.

20 - 50%

Reduced operational costs through bespoke and turnkey solutions.

50+ Years

Experience in technology and telecommunications sectors.

Our Values
Our Services
CONSULTING
Consulting

Sphere Global provides consulting services that improve business efficiency, reduce costs, and leverage technology for growth. Our Cost Optimization Services streamline operations, reduce expenses, and improve resource use, boosting EBITDA by lowering costs and enhancing productivity. Our Project Management as a Service (PMaaS) ensures efficient, on-budget project execution with a flexible pay-as-you-go model for resource scaling. Read more

Know more
BPO
BPO

At Sphere Global, we offer a full suite of BPO services designed to enhance operational efficiency and accelerate business growth. Our Sales Support Services empower teams to generate leads, manage CRM, process orders, and improve customer retention, helping businesses optimize their sales strategies and strengthen client relationships. Through our Back Office Support  Read more

Know more
INDUSTRIES
Industries
Sphere Global provides specialized BPO services tailored to drive growth and enhance operations across various industries. Telecommunications, we offer comprehensive services like sales support, provisioning desk management, and back-office engineering to ensure efficient service activation, billing, and customer support, reducing downtime  Read more
Know more
Testimonials
Wayne Churchill - CEO NormCyber

"We initially engaged Sphere Global to provide consultancy services to assist with due diligence prior to a major acquisition. The Sphere team quickly became an integral part our management team and spearheaded the post-merger integration of a national telecommunications business. 

Sphere's project and programme capabilities enabled Nasstar to deliver both cost savings and business benefits. This was done by reviewing and eliminating costs, managing a major programme to transform the acquired network assets to remove legacy voice switches and SDH interconnects, deliver an IP enabled environment and deliver an asset light cloud native environment.

Sphere Global have become a trusted partner to us and are now a key enabler to swiftly deliver significant transformation objectives for us."

Leigh Walgate - CTO Nasstar

“We are extremely satisfied with the support provided by Sphere Global during the transition of several functions from the UK to their respective teams. Their expertise and guidance have ensured a seamless transition. As a result, we have not only significantly reduced overhead costs but also seen an increase in customer satisfaction. Sphere Global has played a crucial role in refining and streamlining our processes, improving efficiency and service quality. We are confident in our partnership with Sphere Global and look forward to continued success together.”

Yossi Sharon - CEO Univonix

"We recently collaborated with Sphere Global on a joint customer project focused on voice transformation, and the experience exceeded all expectations. Throughout the project, the Sphere Global team conducted themselves with the utmost professionalism, demonstrating meticulous attention to every detail. Their ability to manage risks effectively was exceptional, ensuring a smooth process from start to finish. Impressively, the project was not only delivered on time but also came in below budget—a rare achievement in such a complex transformation initiative. Sphere Global’s dedication and expertise made them an invaluable partner, and we look forward to working with them again."

Ankur Yogesh Dallal - Tier 1 Service Provider

"Sphere Global has been an instrumental partner in providing technical and project consultancy to support our complex, multi-product global deployments. Their expertise in orchestrating large-scale projects has been invaluable in ensuring the smooth execution of these business-critical initiatives. Sphere Global consistently establishes robust reporting processes, facilitating seamless collaboration between internal and external teams. Their ability to drive projects to a successful close, even under challenging conditions, has made them our partner of choice for supporting complex programs. We highly value their dedication, professionalism, and proven track record in delivering impactful results."

Trusted By

Testimonials
Wayne Churchill - CEO NormCyber

"We initially engaged Sphere Global to provide consultancy services to assist with due diligence prior to a major acquisition. The Sphere team quickly became an integral part our management team and spearheaded the post-merger integration of a national telecommunications business. 

Sphere's project and programme capabilities enabled Nasstar to deliver both cost savings and business benefits. This was done by reviewing and eliminating costs, managing a major programme to transform the acquired network assets to remove legacy voice switches and SDH interconnects, deliver an IP enabled environment and deliver an asset light cloud native environment.

Sphere Global have become a trusted partner to us and are now a key enabler to swiftly deliver significant transformation objectives for us."

Leigh Walgate - CTO Nasstar

“We are extremely satisfied with the support provided by Sphere Global during the transition of several functions from the UK to their respective teams. Their expertise and guidance have ensured a seamless transition. As a result, we have not only significantly reduced overhead costs but also seen an increase in customer satisfaction. Sphere Global has played a crucial role in refining and streamlining our processes, improving efficiency and service quality. We are confident in our partnership with Sphere Global and look forward to continued success together.”

Yossi Sharon - CEO Univonix

"We recently collaborated with Sphere Global on a joint customer project focused on voice transformation, and the experience exceeded all expectations. Throughout the project, the Sphere Global team conducted themselves with the utmost professionalism, demonstrating meticulous attention to every detail. Their ability to manage risks effectively was exceptional, ensuring a smooth process from start to finish. Impressively, the project was not only delivered on time but also came in below budget—a rare achievement in such a complex transformation initiative. Sphere Global’s dedication and expertise made them an invaluable partner, and we look forward to working with them again."

Ankur Yogesh Dallal - Tier 1 Service Provider

"Sphere Global has been an instrumental partner in providing technical and project consultancy to support our complex, multi-product global deployments. Their expertise in orchestrating large-scale projects has been invaluable in ensuring the smooth execution of these business-critical initiatives. Sphere Global consistently establishes robust reporting processes, facilitating seamless collaboration between internal and external teams. Their ability to drive projects to a successful close, even under challenging conditions, has made them our partner of choice for supporting complex programs. We highly value their dedication, professionalism, and proven track record in delivering impactful results."

Offering bespoke consulting and BPO solutions designed to transform, automate and boost efficiency within your business 		

						
				
				
				
					
		
			  Your Digital Transformation  Partner Is Here

VISION 				
				
				
				
					Innovative & Efficient 
Process Management				
				
				
				
									Sphere Global Solutions transforms business operations with innovative, customized BPO services. Through deep understanding of client needs, we implement solutions that improve efficiency, reduce costs, and elevate customer experience. Our expert team ensures exceptional service and fosters growth for global businesses.

COMPANY				
				
				
				
					
		
			 Transforming Business With Expert Consulting		

						
				
				
		
				
				
					
			

				
				
				
				
				
				100% 				Client satisfaction rate in delivering tailored BPO and consulting solutions.
				
				
				
			

						
				
				
				
					
			

				
				
				
				
				
				20+ 				Partnered with over 20 global brands to transform business processes.
				
				
				
			

						
				
				
				
					
			

				
				
				
				
				
				Over 30+ 				Average operational efficiency gains of for clients through process automation.
				
				
				
			

						
				
				
		
				
				
					
			

				
																
				
				
				
				5,00,000 + 				Hours of delivered project management for complex, large-scale initiatives.
				
				
				
			

						
				
				
				
					
			

				
				
				
				
				
				20 - 50% 				Reduced operational costs through bespoke and turnkey solutions.
				
				
				
			

						
				
				
				
					
			

				
					
				
				
				
				50+ Years 				Experience in technology and telecommunications sectors.

Our Values				
				
		
					
		
		
				
				
					Independent				
				
				
				
							
			
							
					
						
		
						
				
				
				
				
									At Sphere Global, we deliver unbiased, precise solutions tailored to each client, driving success through innovation, integrity, and strategic insight.								
				
				
					
				
		
					
		
		
				
				
					Inspired				
				
				
				
							
			
							
					
						
		
						
				
				
				
				
									With deep industry expertise and strategic insight, we deliver tailored solutions that empower clients to achieve measurable success and sustained growth.								
				
				
					
				
		
					
		
		
				
				
					Involved				
				
				
				
							
			
							
					
						
		
						
				
				
				
				
									From start to finish, we’re deeply engaged in your transformation, offering personalized solutions that fuel lasting success and become a cornerstone of your business journey.

Consulting		

						
				
				
				
									Sphere Global provides consulting services that improve business efficiency, reduce costs, and leverage technology for growth. Our Cost Optimization Services streamline operations, reduce expenses, and improve resource use, boosting EBITDA by lowering costs and enhancing productivity. Our Project Management as a Service (PMaaS) ensures efficient, on-budget project execution with a flexible pay-as-you-go model for resource scaling. 
			 Sphere Global’s Technical Consulting helps businesses enhance operations, security, and innovation through strategic planning, system integration, and ongoing optimization, enabling cost reduction, proactive risk management, and a competitive edge in the digital landscape.
		Read more								
				
				
				
									
					
						
									Know more

BPO		

						
				
				
				
									At Sphere Global, we offer a full suite of BPO services designed to enhance operational efficiency and accelerate business growth. Our Sales Support Services empower teams to generate leads, manage CRM, process orders, and improve customer retention, helping businesses optimize their sales strategies and strengthen client relationships. Through our Back Office Support  
			 Services, we streamline essential processes like service provisioning, billing, and customer support, allowing front-line teams to focus on core business functions while reducing costs and upholding quality standards. Our Data Entry Management Services provide reliable, precise data handling through both manual and automated solutions, ensuring data integrity and accessibility. With comprehensive analytics and regular audits, we help businesses make informed decisions and achieve their strategic goals. 
		Read more								
				
				
				
									
					
						
									Know more

Industries		

						
				
				
				
									Sphere Global provides specialized BPO services tailored to drive growth and enhance operations across various industries.
Telecommunications, we offer comprehensive services like sales support, provisioning desk management, and back-office engineering to ensure efficient service activation, billing, and customer support, reducing downtime  
			 and improving customer satisfaction.

Finance and accounting , we streamline operations with accounts payable/receivable management, bookkeeping, tax preparation, payroll processing, and financial reporting, helping businesses maintain compliance, financial accuracy, and informed decision-making.
Travel and hospitality sector, we enhance guest experiences and optimize business efficiency through services such as reservation management, guest relations, and digital marketing.
IT support , data management, and strategic consulting empower businesses across all sectors to stay competitive, leveraging technology and analytics to achieve operational excellence and sustainable growth. 
		Read more								
				
				
				
									
					
						
									Know more

									“We are extremely satisfied with the support provided by Sphere Global during the transition of several functions from the UK to their respective teams. Their expertise and guidance have ensured a seamless transition.
